price: Et dès que la caravane eut franchi la frontière [de Canaan], leur père dit : “Je décèle, certes, l’odeur de Joseph, même si vous dites que je radote.”
arabic: وَلَمَّا فَصَلَتِ ٱلۡعِيرُ قَالَ أَبُوهُمۡ إِنِّي لَأَجِدُ رِيحَ يُوسُفَۖ لَوۡلَآ أَن تُفَنِّدُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walammā faṣalati al-ʿīru qāla abūhum innī la-ajidu rīḥa yūsufa lawlā an tufannidūni
translations: you think me weakened in mind
